data.title: 14K Gold Filled Guadalupe Colorful Evil Eye Bracelet
data.body_html:
PRODUCT DETAILS:

  • 14k Gold Plated Bracelet
  • Size: 8 Inches + 2 Inch Extension 
  • Color: Gold
  • Metal Type: 14K Gold
  • Features: Tarnish & Nickel Free, Hypoallergenic 

This 14k Gold Plated Bracelet comes with multicolor evil eye charms. Wear this evil eye protection bracelet to ward off negative energy and attract good fortune, luck, protection, and prosperity. It protects against the Evil Eye such as negative energy, bad thoughts, and ill will from others.

The Colorful Evil Eye Bracelet is a wonderful way to draw positive energy, wealth, success, health, and good luck into your life. This simple and dainty accessory is suitable for everyone. This Evil Eye Protect Bracelet shields the owner from negativity, jealousy, and harm. It is a good gift for your lover, family, or friend.
data.tags: 14k Gold Plated Bracelet, Colorful Evil Eye Bracelet, Evil Eye Protect Bracelet

data.title: 14k Gold Plated Cross Roses Necklace
data.body_html:
Cross Roses Necklace is a beautiful three rose design to make the pendant more delicate, high polish lead to a smooth surface and is comfortable to wear. It features AAA grade quality premium brass over 14K gold plated, nickel-free, lead-free, cadmium-free. 

This Figaro Chain Cross Necklace is a simple and elegant design and is very amazing. It is elegant, powerful, and sophisticated are a few words to describe this timeless 14k gold plated gold cross pendant. This 14k gold plated cross necklace is a piece that radiates confidence while also sending a powerful message.

 

PRODUCT DETAILS:

  • Pendant Details: 1.5 Inch Long 
  • Necklace Type: Pendant Necklaces
  • Metal Type: 14k Gold
  • Type: 14K Gold Plated Necklace
  • Chain Cut: 3MM
  • Features: Tarnish & Nickel Free, Hypoallergenic

data.title: 14K Gold Plated Our Lady Of Guadalupe Heart Necklace
data.body_html:
PRODUCT DETAILS:

  • Type: 14K Gold Plated Heart Virgen Mary
  • Metal Type: 14k Gold,Brass
  • Length: 1 Inch
  • Width: 1 Inch
  • Chain Cut: 3MM
  • Features: Tarnish & Nickel Free, Hypoallergenic

Our Lady Of Guadalupe Heart Necklace comes with a simple and elegant design and is very amazing. Each necklace is finely polished, and the surface is smooth and shiny.  It is making the entire pendant look shiny and holy. It has a nice weight and exquisite look. This necklace is easy to pair with any dress suit and it is a surprise for your family. This necklace is easy to wear, comfortable, and safe. 

This 14K Gold Plated Necklace is tarnish-free, lead-free, nickel-free, and anti-allergy. This Guadalupe heart necklace will not make the skin look green or itchy, it is great for your skin. This heart necklace comes with a free gift box.

data.title: 14K Gold Plated Saint Jude Necklace
data.body_html:
PRODUCT DETAILS:

  • Length: 1 Inch 
  • Width 0.5 Inch  
  • Material: 14K Gold Plated,Brass
  • Chain Cut:  3MM 
  • Features: Tarnish & Nickel Free, Hypoallergenic

Saint Jude CZ Necklace is minimalist, an everyday necklace that goes with anything, This necklace is designed to be worn all day. It will definitely decorate your look and make you look charming and elegant. It is around saint Jude Pendant with design. It is lightweight and comfortable to wear.

14K Gold Plated San Judas Necklace is lead-free & nickel-free, hypoallergenic tarnish, and fade resistant for long-lasting wear. Its color is not easily tarnished, strong and durable. This necklace is a special design that will make you look unique and simple and elegant to dress up or down.

  • Color: Gold

  • You can modify the rules below to change which products are recommended. Products at the top of the list are more likely to be shown.
  • To enable/disable recommendations in your emails, login to the OrderlyEmails app (Shopify Admin -> Apps) and add the "Recommended products" section to an email in the editor.

Note: This collection is "hidden", it is not be visible on your website.

data.title: Saint Jude 14K Gold Plated CZ Round Necklace
data.body_html:
PRODUCT DETAILS:

    • Length: 1Inch
    • Width: 1 Inch
    • Chain Thickness: 3MM
    • Material Type: 14K Gold, Brass
    • Features: Tarnish & Nickel Free, Hypoallergenic

    Saint Jude CZ Round Necklace is made of high-quality material. These pendants are finished to give off more shine and luster by reflecting surrounding light. Combined with high polished gold, this set is a guaranteed hit at any event. Comfort, class, and practical are words to describe these classic pendants. 

    14K Gold Plated Saint Jude Necklace is lead-free, nickel-free, and hypoallergenic. 14K gold plated gives it the look of quality, it will not turn your skin green, non-tarnish. It brings you a better wearing experience. This necklace is lightweight and comfortable to wear. It is a simple and elegant design. It is easy to pair with any dress suit and it is a surprise for your family. It is easy to wear, comfortable, and very safe.
data.tags: 14K Gold Plated Saint Jude Necklace, Saint Jude CZ Round Necklace
